title: sIFR 3 + Chrome = :(?
content: Has anyone else had trouble with sIFR 3 crashing the Flash plugin in Chrome 3.0.195.25 (or a similar version)? I'm wondering if it has anything to do with my implementation, though when using sIFR 2 in the past I haven't had any issues so I'm also thinking it could be a sIFR 3 thing.
author: Ehague
